website_summaries.verdict: Not only is it well-made and practical, but it has user-friendly extras that outpace others on our list.
pros: With an MP3 player, resistance straps, and LED monitor, getting a full-body workout is convenient and fun
cons: Pricier than some competitors, but it also offers more
High-speed settings are not for novices, but there are ample lower speeds, too

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and stable, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised at how well this works. I added to my chiropractic office for patients to use after ZERONA Z6 non surgical liposuction to promote lymphatic circulation. The unit I tried at a seminar was a $3000 unit, and this was just as good. I was surprised at how quiet and stable it was, even at high speeds. We have this on a second floor with a massage room next door, and you can not hear this machine at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk G

customer_reviews.title: Pinty 2000W
customer_reviews.text: I just got the machine yesterday. A friend put it together for me. It came on a perfect day, I had a lot of pain in my hips. After finishing with a couple other projects, I got on the machine. It's default is 10min. I gradually went to 10 and stayed there for the rest of the time. When it stopped, I waited a couple of minutes before getting off. When I did get off, my hips didn't hurt. My first thought was 'WOW'. I got up this morning and still no pain in my hips. I love it. I have fibromyalgia and arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this machine for about a week and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this machine for about a week and love it!! I tried a different model at a trade show that was much more expensive. I find this one to be just as good and much more cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrating my way to mountain climbing.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect with this machine. I am using it daily and feel more energetic than I have for a while. It seems to be improving muscle tone but it is still too early to tell much about it.. at my age just about anything helps. The quality of the machine is good and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and simple.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed and totally satisfied. Super easy to use & it doesn't take up too much room. Major easy to assemble because the screws are already in place so you just unscrew then add a bar then re-screw .
customer_reviews.author: valerie ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cheap and flimsy. Shakes horribly. Would not recommend. Putting together was easy except the tools given broke thankfully I had my own Allen wrench. Spend your money wisely. Invest in a more expensive machine this is a piece of scrap.
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA R MONCURE

customer_reviews.title: Feeling stronger already.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it. If you use it every day for 15 minutes, you will see slow and steady results. I'm two weeks into it and can feel the difference in my thighs and glutes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Unsure how the product would be at the price point. It works very good with several modes to choose from and the arm/leg bands. It is a weird feeling to feel like you have exercised without actually exercising. I have tried similar machines but priced much higher at public events and it feels the same as those. The only difference is this machine's platform is not raised up above the base to help relieve back pain like the much higher priced machines are. I would buy the machine again as it works very well and is relatively quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Tara J.

customer_reviews.title: $200 Vibration Plate save $1800!
customer_reviews.text: Love it just as good as the $2000 kind. 1-180 hz and program modes. 2000 watts says it all. Great for my knee issues and wife's osteoporosis. Sleep like a baby!
customer_reviews.author: technoman

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but....
customer_reviews.text: The Pinty 2000W Vibration Platform was very smooth and had a lot of features. But the package and quality of the machine was terrible. There was scratches on the control panel and some weird film on the middle of the handle. I talked with the the company and there excuse was "That is was from testing the machine." So I sent it back, and got a portable vibration platform for half the cost and the package was 100% and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine🌞

customer_reviews.title: what a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: whatever you do, don't buy this. First, it won't do the modes, then it stopped doing the reduce speed, and now, it has stopped the increase speed function, speed one doesn't do much. I bought the extended warranty but it never came.
customer_reviews.author: Kathlyn M.

customer_reviews.title: This machine is awesome. I have used this everyday since
customer_reviews.text: This machine is awesome. I have used this everyday since, I received it. I can tell it has helped with my back issues. The position that I believe is helping the muscle tone on my legs is when I just stand on the machine with legs ever so slightly bent at the knee. The vibration platform is very quiet when running, however when you upgrade the speed it does shake. I also enjoy the mode settings available. Easy assembly, we did not have any problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Sam0127

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even tell you how this thing is because it did not start at all. My husband had put it together and let me tell you my husband is an engineer... wasted $200 on this.
customer_reviews.author: madame.medford

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was not to bad. Tools included were sufficient to get the job done. Take care that the wires are positioned properly, if you are interested in using the BIN feature. It is surprisingly quiet and definitely powerful. At 250 lbs, it gave me a great workout and it seemed as if it was not even tired. I am tickled to finally have a vibrating platform, especially such a great price. Such a simple task...stand still, flex knees a little, and you will receive a definite workout. No doubt about.
customer_reviews.author: William Hindman

customer_reviews.title: Base falling apart after 1 month of use; 3 bolts dropped out & nuts are rattling around inside
customer_reviews.text: Loved it when it was working, but it didn't work for long: I bought it less than a year ago but did not start using it regularly until a month ago. A few days ago while Iwas using it heard the sound of small metal hitting the floor, and found the bolts completely detached and lying on the floor underneath it. Now its completely inoperable as the platform base unit is not securely fastened. The owner's manual is a joke and I can not find ANY information about how to repair this problem. There is NO CUSTOMER SERVICE or contact info for the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: HealthNut

customer_reviews.title: Easy way too tighten core
customer_reviews.text: I like my pinty whole body vibrator and actually use it every day. It has strengthened my core a little. As far as weight loss not a pound. I did have too tighten the plate down a few times now every time it gets too noisy.
customer_reviews.author: LSJ

customer_reviews.title: very loud, my motor must be bad because this thing is about to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: motor loud, shakes so hard its about to fall apart. I would pass on this one
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when I received it and it shook sk bad, I couldn't read the display.
customer_reviews.author: SBooker

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but when I got mine and put it together it made alot of noise and the swivel part would not turn. Come to find out the screws under the swivel part were not screwed in like they are suppose to be. We had to fix it and it is missing a bearing. I have only had it a week. If you buy this make sure all the screws are on tight including the ones under the swivel part. On the bright side I do like the product and use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Lorene D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Quiet and doesn't take up much room.
customer_reviews.text: We received our 2000W machine today. It was packaged very well. All parts were there and all of the holes lined up so each screw went in easily. It took less the 20 minutes to assemble. We are very surprised how quiet the motor is and rather impressed how sturdy it is. My husband weights 230 lbs at 6 ft, no problem. I tried the auto set for 10 minutes which sets the speed at different stages within the ten minutes, increasing then decreasing. Some reviews suggest to start slow but I walk about 4 Miles a day, I'm 75 years old and not sedimentary by no means so I might spike things up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Longshadow

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Good machine. VERY quiet. There was no bag of screws - instead, all screws were in the holes they were meant for - very good idea. It made assembly simple. Pictures in manual way too small to view adequately making is hard to figure out which piece to attach to what. It comes with stretch bands - no instructions on where to mount - in manual or online. You Tube had exercises, but none with bands. Interestingly, there's NO COMPANY NAME OR WEBSITE in the manual -- who are they hiding from?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Hate this Vib!
customer_reviews.text: Worst Vib I have ever had. The machine feels like it is going to fall apart when standing on it. The noise is so loud it sounds like an old washer or dryer falling apart in the next room! please don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: carley

customer_reviews.title: Great for 15 months
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have used this machine on a regular basis since purchasing in October, 2018. It was easy to assemble and has worked well until yesterday. All of a sudden it is making terrible noises to the point of almost needing ear plugs. I am afraid it is dying and of course the warranty is only for one year. I have checked all of the screws and they do not need to be tightened. I really expected this machine to last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: C. bradley

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I stepped on the platform, the high setting caused pain in my thighs due to inflammation. After using it for a week, there is no pain. And, I think it is helping my circulation and lymphatic system. It's quick and easy, so why not do it?
customer_reviews.author: ndgirl

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was looking so forward to getting this machine. I have used one at my chiropractor’s office and love it. When we opened the box and unpackaged it the base has a large crack. I am waiting to hear from the company on how to get a replacement or return the item. This is a large, heavy item to have to return. I will update my review after getting a response. UPDATE: The company responded to my issue promptly. It is now one week after the first delivery and they have sent a replacement machine. I just completed assembly and it works perfectly. I could not be happier with this company and their prompt attention to making this right!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I "wasted" the money as my better half said
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it was deeply discounted through a website. I am so glad I "wasted" the money as my better half said. We love it and laugh so much using it! There are parts of my body that jiggle to infinity on this thing! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Supercooper32

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I didnt find it easy to get a speed that would not shake my eyeballs out, so to speak ..lol.. I didn't think it was enjoyable, but rather annoying ... so it sits in the corner ...... I did try a more expensive one ,that was demonstrated at Costco that was very nice when I tried it , but I decided to get this model for a cheaper price online ... Bad decision :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment for good health!
customer_reviews.text: Came almost a week early. I was not happy as it was a Chanukah gift for this coming weekend. But, my son loves it and that's what counts. I've owned one of these for a few years. It's a massage for the entire body. Doing toe lifts immediately, visibly increased my leg muscles. I've been told daily use is good for lymph nodes and very beneficial for seniors. My son uses it daily and loves it as well. Keep moving and stay healthy!
customer_reviews.author: SuzL

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: So far, it was mostly easy to put together, some of the screws were a little tough. I think a better tool would have worked better. Works as advertised. I had thought the swivel would be one of the settings, but the swivel you work yourself. The rest, it has adjustments and modes that you can set to what you want, and get a great workout. Very happy with this purchase, as it works great, and I get a great workout to improve my balance and my circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as the commercial one I used at a health facility. The only thing I will say is there’s a MP3 plug, but nowhere to set what you plug in so it just hangs and rattles while you are on there which doesn’t really allow you to use it. Also wish there was somewhere to attach the arm bands when you aren’t using them at the top.
customer_reviews.author: ActiveAutumn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product! Can see results already and haven't used ...
customer_reviews.text: Came REAL fast ,within 4 days of order. For the price ,GREAT product ! Can see results already and haven't used more than a week. .Need to do lots of different movements while on it to benefit whole body. If younger, may want a faster speed but this works for me. Did have handy man set up & didn't take him long. Has really helped keep my back in check . Happy I purchased, as makes exercise fun and time goes fast as I can watch t v as I work out !
customer_reviews.author: relaxin1844

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy Based In Watching Video!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very unhappy it did not come as advertised. Also very upset that I now have to HIRE someone to box it up and return bc I am handicapped Advertised to click together, and rotating platform. Neither are accurate. I watched the video both of these things are in there.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Haven't played the audio but the machine works fine and it's all I hoped for and the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't played the audio but the machine works fine and it's all I hoped for and the price was right. Pat Hakes
customer_reviews.author: sunseeker

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Worse than assembling ikea furniture, very unstable and shaky, loud, and unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: smoochdown

customer_reviews.title: So far, a waste
customer_reviews.text: So far, a total waste. I cannot get”mode” button to work. Which sort of seems like an important function. Trying to communicate with seller/maker is difficult and is taking weeks to get a response. Finally got one after 2 weeks but only because I followed up. And the answer made no sense. Will be happy to update this review if/when they resolve/replace/refund.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ransom

customer_reviews.title: The ORIGINAL Pinty!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly rugged construction. Very well made. It IS beneficial and raises your cardio. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hildreth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, works great
customer_reviews.text: Multiple programmed settings to give multiple workouts. Manual setting allows even more options. Very quiet operation. I use it to treat peripheral nephropathy and stimulate lymphatic drainage. Nice little workout. When ordered, it advertised good to 330 pounds. The products says not to exceed 128 kg. Works for me at 250 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: A wee bit smaller than the $2200 one they sell at Costco; and it works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Litigation Support

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Machine works well, but there is an awe full electronic buzz that comes from the speakers from the second it’s turned on. It’s very irritating. Way to heavy and difficult to return.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAndTrue

customer_reviews.title: Like a body massage.
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this machine - now that I know how it works I think the ones that are just platforms are better because you can assume different positions much easier. This really helps with my aches and pains. I use it 3 times a day and I can now get on and off my horse without pain. I'm 67 and have the typical old lady aches. This machine is really making a difference. It works!
customer_reviews.author: JDiet

customer_reviews.title: Helps backaches and knees
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using this for 2 weeks now and we both love it. Not 100% sure if this works to tone/tighten the body yet. I do squats and work my arms with weights while on the machine. The one thing that I definitely notice is that it has helped with my back and knees. I have not had any back issues since I started using this. We use it daily and have recommended this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Klehr

customer_reviews.title: Pinty 200W Body Vibration Platform
customer_reviews.text: I used the vibration machine mostly for circulation - I'm not sure how much good it did - but I enjoyed using it. As with most items like this, I used it faithfully for about 6 months and then it became a clothes hanger. It's been out in my storage shed for almost a year now. Unless you have a workout area, I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars, if machine wasn't missing a wire in the beginning. BANYAN IMPORTS was quick to resolve issue. The machine itself was easy to assemble. Once Banyan sent me the part, I had it together in an hour. It works fine. Easy to use and doesn't take up a lot of space. I have mobility problems and I hope it will help me move around better. I haven't had it long enough to see if it will make a difference, but it's easy on my joints.
customer_reviews.author: willa damu

customer_reviews.title: One you put it together sound like a construction sight when on
customer_reviews.text: Im Gonna Be Honest This product might work but dang it sounds like someone is jackhammering in the living room. Its noisy as hell, you can't sneak out in the living room and us this. I need a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Yamajesty World

customer_reviews.title: Good for people like me who suffer Lower Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: Good for people like me who suffer Lower Back Pain... I do 2 sessions of 15 minutes and I can late pretty much the whole day without too much lower back pain... It really helps
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy machine
customer_reviews.text: The machine was easy to set up. It’s about 60#. It has two small wheels in the back to make it easier to move. The vibration is quiet but powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Easy exercising
customer_reviews.text: I use all the time about 15 minutes a day it makes me feel great
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: It was working fine and then STOPPED a couple of months later!
customer_reviews.text: I received my machine 4/25/20. It has been working just fine up until 7/7/20. The on and off switch on the bottom will come on; however, none of the buttons on the display are working. The 2 month warranty with Amazon is up. I have sent an email to the seller and I am waiting for a response. Praying that I will be made whole again!
customer_reviews.author: Alesha

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The cords are missing from my machine. I can not connect the stand to the base because not all of the parts were included. I am disappointed in this whole process . The machine came a week late and now it's sitting in pieces waiting to be assembled on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: sheeka

customer_reviews.title: Had to get second machine because first one didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Our machine does not have all the features that our friend's 2000W has. Even the manual is different. She gave me the model number so I ordered what I thought would be the same. I must admit the seller responded promptly to my emails about the first machine and sent another at no charge. I know I will get some benefits from this machine but am somewhat disappointed it doesn't have all the features. ex. The timer only goes up to 12 minutes while my friend's goes up to 50.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Carey

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Was not what I had ordered and would not work so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Feels Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and my wife really likes using it. Just beware, that if you have any artificial joints or knee problems it is probably not for you.
customer_reviews.author: C. Viviano

customer_reviews.title: My Experience
customer_reviews.text: Assembly went somewhat well, husband had to help with one latch that would not line up on the handles when clipping together, the machine at first was so quit then slowly as if the base you stand on begin to loosen up it has developed a noise depending on where and how I stand on it. I weigh 195 lbs so I wouldn't think its my weight. I am going to contact the warranty I purchased with the machine and see what they think.
customer_reviews.author: DARLENE EMERY

customer_reviews.title: So far very pleased. If anything changes in the near future, I’ll update.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a few days ago, but I just put it together yesterday. I should have had my husband do it, not because of the technicalities, but the heaviness of some of the parts- I wound up with quite a bruise. So far it works very well. I wish the instruction manual was more clear. I’ve reviewed it a couple of times, but still no clue about the programs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli G. McLerran

customer_reviews.title: That you do get your excise in.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine it does what it supposed to do. I love that it is not a loud machine. I love that you can hook up your phone to listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: shalaunda  walker

customer_reviews.title: fast and efficient service!
customer_reviews.text: The Pinty exercise vibration machine will be used to develop and maintain flexibility and endurance. I have severe arthritis and the vibration machine is supposed to help the muscles without further injury to my joints. I have not had the opportunity to use it as I have been on vacation but I will start as soon as I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great  Full Body Vibration
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product with a GREAT PRICE!! I wasn't expecting such a great and sturdy product but I am super impressed with it and love using it. Now I just hope it really works to help me reduce fat.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ehlers

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It was easy to assemble ( there is ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It was easy to assemble ( there is also a youtube video to help)...It is sturdy and well built. I have only had it for two days but I have used other vibration plates and this one I love so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout w/out added stress on joints
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. I get a great workout without the added stress on my joints from treadmill & aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: TBISHOP

customer_reviews.title: Great powerful product!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is awesome. We purchased it for my 72 yr old mother who wanted help w/ her balance, strengthening & circulation. It jiggles your entire legs, buttocks & abdomen. Your muscles contract naturally and you can feel your muscles tightening. My mother is using it & now we want to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread for neck and back pain!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to take the time out of my day to write reviews. But people need to know about these vibration platforms. I’ve had serious neck pain for YEARS. This vibration machine has fixed my neck. I don’t know exactly how- all I know is I’m not taking Ibuprofen and Tylenol everyday for neck pain anymore. THIS THING WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love the Vibration and muscle stimulation.
customer_reviews.text: Instruction for putting everything together could have been better. We were able to properly assemble. We have used it daily and feel good benefits for the muscles of our body. I am using it along with floor exercises to improve my balance and walking for my 80 year old body.
customer_reviews.author: Wilmer & Janet  Snyder

customer_reviews.title: The highest speeds are intense.  Pace yourself.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! Sturdy, easy to assemble, strong motor, doesn’t take up a lot of space. Working out at home in these Covid times can be a challenge with limited space and equipment. Adding this machine is a great addition and one of the best decisions I’ve made.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The Pinty Machine
customer_reviews.text: I brought this machine almost a year ago ,its farmost tge best item i brought for my bad kness ,back and overall body .I would tell anyone to buy this machine . Thank You Tracey J
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Helps me with my balance issues
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well for me. I use it to train my legs to use different muscles to help my balance issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli Hinkley

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: We have not had the machine too long but feel improvements are being noticed. We are improved in neck and back areas. A good start!
customer_reviews.author: harold "FRED" butler

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MACHINE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine!! It seems to help my back and neck with the pain from an auto accident I was in. It is fairly quiet also. So far it's holding up well, even with my granddaughters getting on it every time I look around! My daughter uses it also.
customer_reviews.author: kjm901

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: this has helped with my pain levels so much. I am also losing a little weight.
customer_reviews.author: Addie Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is short even though it was made to look like it was tall. It does not pack much power either. It is mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got My Balance Back
customer_reviews.text: I'm 77 and was losing my balance. A friend suggested this machine and it has WORKED! I'm on it every morning and in the evening if I have muscle cramps, it totally stops them.
customer_reviews.author: Vickiannh

customer_reviews.title: Product is everything its advertised to be
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this machine.I works great and is amazingly quiet. I highly recommend this to anyone needing cellulite reduction, increased circulation and burn calories
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine, it’s not for commercial use but good for home use, I recommend it! Start slowly!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my Mom for her 78th birthday, it’s easy for her to use and I use it too! Good for your circulation!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Quiet operation.
customer_reviews.text: Received today. Took about 30 minutes to assemble. Directions were not very clear however, it wasn’t very difficult to put together. Used it for about 10 minutes this afternoon. Was surprised at how quiet it was! Appears to be good quality. I’m confident it will be useful and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lavines

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. Great price. But a word of caution make sure u check the weight requirements, cause if you are very heavy it makes noises, meaning it can't take a lot of weight!
customer_reviews.author: TerreP

customer_reviews.title: We just got it and are pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The vibration platform is very quiet when running. We just got it and are pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Crossland

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Certainly not a high end whole body vibration unit, but it works relatively quietly, is fairly stable, and is a good introduction to the therapy in office.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: i like it.
customer_reviews.text: It gets my muscles going and I will be glad to add this to my exercise machines.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this machine
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, assembly was fairly simple & took me about an hour. So far so good as I have used it for 3 days now and it has shortened & intensified my work while helping my lower back issues. I look forward to making this a regular part of my daily fitness routine & recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shoefashionista

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine very much. My Dr recommended I use it to help move my lymph fluid. I had severe leg pain. It went together very easily. It has more bells and whistles than I will ever use and most of all it is extremely quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: Product misrepresented on video. Does not have the circular rotating plate not even a place to mount it. Update: supplier was most cooperative in remedying issue. Corrected presentation to show different models with different features.
customer_reviews.author: Liisa

customer_reviews.title: ... BUTT BACK LOWER STOMACH TIGHTENING UP THIS IS AS GOOD AS A 1000$ MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: AWSOME MACHINE I USE IT TWICE DAILY 20 MINUTES EACH LEGS BUTT BACK LOWER STOMACH TIGHTENING UP THIS IS AS GOOD AS A 1000$ MACHINE THANKS
customer_reviews.author: sweetone

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just love this machine I don't know why I didn't get it sooner
customer_reviews.author: this app is so amazing

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine. I started using it after I received it. Now I have lost 2-3 pounds in about 10 days. I am very happy. I have introduced it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: JIN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting used to, but it does help my legs feel a lot better. I have very bad knees and 10 minutes each morning on this really loosens them up, making it a lot easier for me to get around.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Hurry up and wait!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried my machine out and I like it very much. I won't use it much until I see my doctor. My daughter loves it, so I bought her one too. She lives in Michigan .
customer_reviews.author: honeybunch

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISINGLY QUIET - Very Sturdy/Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value - well made - very sturdy - surprisingly quiet. Already recommended to 2 family members.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great exercise machine. I love it. You pretty much stand there on the oscillating platform. My muscle are sore when I am done, so I know it is working. This really does work.
customer_reviews.author: James Light

customer_reviews.title: Buy this shaker.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Great value. Works awesome. Highly recommended. Had a dual motor unit in past and this gets the jobs done as welll if not better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Montenero

customer_reviews.title: Does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing! It does everything it says it do. Only wish it was bluetooth and allowed you to enter more than 20 minutes at a time. Shipping was estimated 14 days. Received purchase within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I’ve lost 15 pounds in one month, not really changing eating habits, but intermittent fasting along with it. My joints and body feel amazing. It does make some noise, but the benefit will make you forget that noise quickly. The highest I have gotten on it is 50, but working my way up! Absolutely LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hodged

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We are using the product to improve overall health, weight loss and improved circulation.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost to keep not worth the trouble to return. Out of the money...a loss
customer_reviews.text: Did not like how rikidy it was. It rattled and shook noisily. Does not always turn on or reset properly. Using for circulation and joints and Weight loss.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my leg pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few weeks ago and I love it. I use it at least 2 to 3 times a day and I haven't had any problems. After a week though I had to tighten up the nuts and that helped with noise.

customer_reviews.title: More than happy
customer_reviews.text: Large platform so I don't feel cramped and it assembled in less than an hour. Really impressed that all the screws were in the right holes, so no guessing if I had the right one in the right place.

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of equipment

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: If your lookin for a vibrating plate this is the one for you. Can shake a 300lb adult with out skipping a beat!!! Shakes 300lbs just as hard as 150lbs

customer_reviews.title: Shake it up

customer_reviews.text: Works out the aches and pains in this old body. Thin on construct but holding up with daily use so far. Gets the circulation going.

product_meta.title: Pinty 2000W Whole Body Vibration Platform Exercise Machine with MP3 Player
feature_bullets: SUPERPOWER & QUIET MOTOR - Pinty’s latest vibration machine features a 2000W motor, effectively and quietly shakes your whole body while you enjoy your favorite music flowing out of the integrated MP3 player

LED MONITOR WITH PRESET PROGRAMS - 10 different preset programs and 180 speed adjustments guarantee the appropriate workout intensity for every user, the easy-to-operate LED monitor displays mode, time, BMI as well as speed for you to conveniently monitor your body

PREMIUM QUALITY & DURABLE - Solid metal frame with weight capacity up to 330 lbs., base board finished in non-toxic premium non-skid ABS, durable and anti-static, equipped with caster wheels for easy transport
PERFECT FOR DAILY USE - Comes with two detachable resistance straps for you to work out your arms and upper body in various positions. Perfect exercise equipment for daily use
IMPROVE OVERALL HEALTH - Our body vibrating machine proved to help burn body fat, improve flexibility, relieve chronic pains, and promote muscle strength & blood circulation
